page.title: 01A general view of Uxbridge
page.content: The former market town of Uxbridge is today the administrative centre of Hillingdon Borough.Its Civic Centre is a landmark in modern civic architecture.West of the town lies the rural district of Denham in Buckinghamshire.London is 16 miles away and Heathrow Airport is four miles to the south.The A40/M40 and M4 motorways are close at hand,and a section of the M25 motorway is under construction to the west.Uxbridge is a terminus for the Metropolitan and Piccadilly lines of the London Underground system.These factors explain why much office development has taken place in the town recently,and contiues today.East of the town lies the Royal Air Force Station,an administrative headquarters which includes the home of the R.A.F.Central Band.
